page.title: 17AT HOME IN STEWARTON
page.content: Most homes share in the commmunity life of the town with members of many families associated with the activities of the town. Although there is a little unemployment and a few one parent families in the town the quality of life is high. More and more people are buying fast foods but there is still a great interest in home cooking and the Women's Rural Institute and Cookery classes are well attended. With the prosperity of the two health shops people are tending to have more nutritious food.People are made aware of home and farm safety by Health and Safety rules.Mr Robert Wilson of Old Glasgow Road this year was awarded a M.B.E. for his contribution to Factory Safety. Many families have dogs, cats, birds, small animals and fish. The pet shop Animal Magic supplies goods for these.
